about-1.defaultMessage: This app helps you in shuffling lists. When you have distinct sets of people or objects (and their copies), and you want to pair them up randomly, this app will help you.

about-2.defaultMessage: For example in Secret Santa mode, you have one list that you want to pair up with itself (a copy).

about-3.defaultMessage: If you want to pair up a list with itself, so that 3 items of the same list will be in a pair, set the multiplicity to 3.

bookmark-this-page.defaultMessage: Bookmark this page if you want to come back later.

christmas-create.defaultMessage: Create your own Secret Santa shuffle

couldnt-create-instance.defaultMessage: Couldn’t create new instance, maybe try reloading the page and trying again.

couldnt-in-instance.defaultMessage: Couldn’t log into instance, maybe the code provided was wrong.

couldnt-in-list.defaultMessage: Couldn’t log into list, maybe the code provided was wrong.

couldnt-in-listitem.defaultMessage: Couldn’t log into listitem, maybe the code provided was wrong.

couldnt-save-preset.defaultMessage: Couldn’t save preset, maybe try reloading the page and trying again.

create-your-own.defaultMessage: Create your own lists and shuffle

do-you-delete-instance.defaultMessage: Do you really want to delete the whole instance? You will need to start over again if you want to shuffle.

do-you-delete-item.defaultMessage: Do you really want to delete this item? You will be returned to the homepage.

do-you-delete-list.defaultMessage: Do you really want to delete this list?

error-adding-list.defaultMessage: Error occurred while adding new list. :/

gdpr-contact.defaultMessage: If you have any questions, write an email to listshuffler@gmail.com

gdpr-cookie-info.defaultMessage: We store IDs in your browser to keep you signed in. If you do not accept this, we will not store anything. If you do, the browser settings decide.

gdpr-note-alias.defaultMessage: Note that we do not recommend you to share any private data with us. If you are worried about the names leaking please use aliases.

gdpr-rights.defaultMessage: When you name a list or its item we store that so next time you log in, the names remain. When you delete a list, everything about it deletes, like its name. Same applies for its items. We delete every instance a month after its creation, so even if you forgot to delete it, it will do so automatically.

gdpr-storage.defaultMessage: Said all that, we store all the aforementioned data in safe databases away from any bad actor, on Amazon Web Services in Frankfurt. Only the people with the right access will be able to see your data and they are requied not to do so by policy.

gdpr-stored-info.defaultMessage: We are committed to your right to security. We do not store any information about you, other than the names you give the lists and their items.

instance-if-ever.defaultMessage: Instance does not exist now, if it ever had.

more-can-muliplier.defaultMessage: The higher the number the more likely the pair.

no-matching.defaultMessage: Couldn’t find matching object, check code and try again!

this-admin-page.defaultMessage: This is the admin page. You can edit lists, probabilities and shuffle here.

this-list-item-1.defaultMessage: This is a list item page. You will be able to see your pairs here.

this-list-item-2.defaultMessage: This is a list item page. You can see your pairs here.

which-will-shuffle-for.defaultMessage: Which list do you want to shuffle pairs for?

you-can-set-multipliers.defaultMessage: You can set multipliers that affect the shuffle process

you-can-share.defaultMessage: You can now share this with the to-be list pairs

you-need-more.defaultMessage: You need as many items in every list as the main list or alternatively set the shuffle as repetitive.

you-need-multiplicity.defaultMessage: You need at least two lists or a list with at least 2 multiplicity to shuffle

you-need-one-item.defaultMessage: You need at least one item in each list to shuffle.
